scripts.clean: npx shx rm -fr ./dist && npx shx rm -fr tsconfig.tsbuildinfo
scripts.dev: npm run build:worker && npm run build:obj2worker && vite
scripts.doc: echo 'docs are not generated for examples'
scripts.build:obj2worker: npx shx mkdir -p ./src/worker/volatile && npx shx cp -f ../../node_modules/wwobjloader2/src/worker/OBJLoader2Worker.js ./src/worker/volatile
scripts.build:worker: npx shx mkdir -p ./src/worker/volatile && npx shx rm -f ./src/worker/volatile/HelloWorldWorkerStandard.js && vite -c vite.config.worker.ts build
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:worker && npm run build:obj2worker && npm run compile
